sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>woman</radical> sees herself (<radical>oneself</radical>) as a <kanji>princess</kanji> or a <kanji>queen</kanji>. As women should!
meaningInfo: Just remember, when you're around other women (and woman-aligned peoples), it's important to treat each other like princess and queens, not just oneself.
readingMnemonic: All of us <kanji>princess</kanji>es and <kanji>queen</kanji>s share a special <reading>hea</reading>t (<ja>ひ</ja>). When we see another princess or queen that heat passes through us and we nod to one another.
readingInfo: All princess and queens can feel the heat coming off of the others.
